scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean; npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy_vesting:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_vesting.js
scripts.deploy:polygon: NETWORK=polygon npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:polygon_test: NETWORK=polygon_test npx hardhat run --network polygon_test scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:arbitrum_test: NETWORK=arbitrum_test npx hardhat run --network arbitrum_test scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:starnet: NETWORK=starnet npx hardhat run --network starnet scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:starnet_testnet: NETWORK=starnet_testnet npx hardhat run --network starnet_testnet scripts/deploy.js
